content.text: Nightjar includes encrypted file storage for each workspace. Upload files, organize them in folders, and share them with collaborators ‚Äî all end-to-end encrypted.

content.caption: The encrypted file storage with drag-and-drop upload and folder organization.

items: Navigate to the Files section of your workspace.
Click "Upload" or drag and drop files into the file area.
Files are encrypted locally before being stored.
Uploaded files are available to all workspace members.

content.text: File storage supports multiple view modes:

items: List view ‚Äî Compact listing with file details.
Grid view ‚Äî Thumbnail/icon grid for visual browsing.

content.text: Files are synced across peers using the P2P mesh. When you upload a file, it is encrypted and distributed to connected workspace members. Files are available offline once synced.
Files are encrypted with the workspace key before storage. The relay server only ever sees encrypted blobs.
